deploy.startCommand: echo 'Starting simple test server...' && node -e "const http = require('http'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/plain'}); res.end('Hello World!'); }); server.listen(8080, '0.0.0.0', () => console.log('Simple test server running on port 8080'));"
